QuestData.Title: Save the Sentinel
QuestData.Description: <Brienna waves a note around with Taur-ahe markings on it.>$B$BThose monsters have captured one of our sentinels! They're threatening to kill her if we don't pull back!$B$BWe don't negotiate with cowardly beasts! Please, if you can, rescue her before it's too late, $c.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Free her before it's too late.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for freeing her, $n. Those Grimtotem monsters would have killed her in cold blood.
